definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: He clearly has a lot of respect for Borges.
sentences.chinese: 他顯然十分地尊重博爾赫斯。

sentences.english: Borges’s universe didn’t have the Internet as we know it.
sentences.chinese: 據我們所知，博爾赫斯當年的世界裏還沒有網絡。

sentences.english: There Borges started to think that his father was her "client".
sentences.chinese: 而博爾赫斯以爲他的父親是那個窯姐兒的老恩主。

definition: Tolstoy (name)/Count Lev Nikolayevich Tostoy (1828-1910), great Russian novelist, author of War and Peace 戰爭與和平|战争与和平
Anton Pavlovich Chekhov (1860-1904), Russian writer famous for his short stories and plays
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
Jonathan D Spence (1936-), distinguished British US historian of China, author of The search for modern China 追尋現代中國|追寻现代中国
The Travels of Lao Tsan, novel by late Qing novelist Liu E 劉鶚|刘鹗[Liu2 E4]
